entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
